> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE paused as he observed, watching in his electrobinoculars, still
> staying under cover.  The DINOBOTS, if they even were all of them, had
> superior senses and they would be optimum at noticing him in this jungle
> environment where he only had his otpics, and his lack of fluency in jungle
> arenas.
>
> So he watched as they seemed ot be..  Making a bridge then.  But for who?
> And for what reason were they setting up for someone to cross?  For now,
> WHEELIE stayed hidden, waiting and observing.

<NEW>

Yes, the fallen trees did indeed certainly seem to be forming a bridge
as they lay down almost next to each other.

SWOOP and the other avian transformers shifted into their robot mode
and began lashing them together what appeared to be ropes and vines,
they were working quickly.

Suddenly in the distance a roar rang out, this one followed by another.

Then there was the sound of a large creature, or several of them
closing in on the gorge from the same side that WHEELIE was on. In
fact it sounded like they were probably going to moving almost through
his hidden position.

SWOOP and the others seemed to hear it as well. Finishing their work
they quickly took to the air as the sounds of the other large
creatures continued to approach. Movements through the brush could be
heard moving fast!

There was another roar, this time it was much closer. It was then that
WHEELIE could possibly place the sound.

The roar sounded distinctly like GRIMLOCK!

                                                                  and
it did not sound like he was alone!

(TAG)

- Preston
